title: HR Analytical System
description: System which provides an appraisal to the employees by collecting their data from the application and generate a report based on their performance using Bayesian ML and decision tree algorithm.

title: FinTrack
description: This IPL winner prediction uses five Machine Learning algorithms with K-10 folds to optimize accuracy. Users input team names,venue, city, toss winner, and toss decision to predict the winner.

title: DrivsyAI
description: Developed a weather dashboard that fetches real-time data from a public API.
